description:
From the first run to the last, this cozy jacket will help your little one forget about the weather. With its seam sealed waterproof breathable shell, the Freedom jacket offers all day protection from the elements. Lined with multiple densities of efficient HeatSeeker™ ECO insulation, warmth is focused where it is needed most. When the heavens open or the wind kicks up, the insulated hood adds an extra layer of warmth. And, there are plenty of pockets throughout the jacket for snacks and daily necessities, there’s even a zippered sleeve pocket keeps their ticket to ride safe and sound.

  • Waterproof breathable DryVent™ 2-layer shell has been fully seam sealed for ultimate weather protection
  • Lined with a light and soft recycled polyester taffeta that feels great against the skin but has a low enough pile for easy layering
  • Heatseeker Eco insulation is lightweight and efficient. 200g insulation through the body, 150g insulation through the sleeves, and 100g insulation in the hood
  • Insulated 3-piece hood fits close to the head, staying in place when the wind picks up
  • Dual zippered hand pockets keep small necessities close
  • Single zippered pocket on the left sleeve is the perfect home for a lift pass
  • Powder skirt helps seal out the white stuff when the fresh tracks run deep
  • Adjustable cuffs keep the warm in and the cold out
name: The North Face Freedom Insulated Jacket - Children
